title: 'Supernatural' star Jared Padalecki arrested for assault
text:
"Supernatural" star Jared Padalecki was arrested for allegedly assaulting two employees at a downtown Austin bar he owns.

Per an arrest affidavit, officers arrived at the bar early Sunday. Padalecki, who rose to fame in "Gilmore Girls," has been charged with two counts of misdemeanor assault with injury.

The affidavit says employees escorted him out of the bar after he fought with people inside. The affidavit says employees then tried to keep Padalecki out "because of his intoxicated behavior."

TERESA GIUDICE OPENS UP ABOUT HUSBAND JOE'S CHEATING ALLEGATIONS, SELFIES WITH ICE AGENTS AND WEIGHT LOSS

An assistant manager told police that Padalecki slapped him. The affidavit says Padalecki punched the general manager, who was trying to separate him from the assistant manager.

Reps for Padalecki did not return Fox News' request for comment.

CLICK HERE TO GET THE FOX NEWS APP

According to a video obtained by TMZ the 37-year-old can be seen putting a man into a headlock. Later, he is seen pulling out what appears to be money and per eye witness accounts, he allegedly flashed the cash at the cops before being arrested.

Travis County Jail records indicate Padalecki isn't being held as of Tuesday.

Padalecki shares three children with wife, Genevieve Cortese.

The Associated Press contributed to this report.
description: "Supernatural" star Jared Padalecki was arrested for allegedly assaulting two employees at a downtown Austin bar he owns.
authors: You Can Find Sasha Savitsky On Twitter
